Title: Economic recovery:‘Nigeria not broke’… but deep fiscal concerns linger
Summary: At least since the turn of the century, the global community has witnessed more bankruptcies than economic milestones and breakthroughs . From the Caribbean to Asia and across Europe, as well as Sub-Saharan Africa, modern economies are replete with bankruptcy crises .

Title: IGP bans officers from land, other civil cases
Summary: IGP Kayode Egbetokun has issued a stern warning to officers of the Nigeria Police Force to steer clear of land disputes and other civil cases . The Inspector-General of Police has banned officers from taking part in land disputes .

Title: ‘How Tinubu ended career stagnation in paramilitary services’
Summary: Interior Minister, Olubunmi Tunji-Ojo, said President Bola Tinubu has ended decades of career stagnation in the nation’s paramilitary services with reforms that prioritised merit, welfare and rapid promotions .

Title: I’ll ‘not allow’ Israel to annex West Bank, says Trump
Summary: US President Donald Trump said Thursday he would not allow key ally Israel to annex the West Bank . Threats by some Israeli cabinet members to do so to kill any two-state solution to Israel . “I will not allow Israel to annexed West Bank, says Trump .

Title: NUPRC approves $510m TotalEnergies divestment to Shell, Agip
Summary: TotalEnergies Exploration and Production Nigeria Limited to divest its 12.5 per cent contractor interest in Oil Mining Lease . The Nigerian Upstream Petroleum Regulatory Commission (NUPRC) approved a $510 million deal .

Title: NGX targets Marine Economy for bond issuanc
Summary: Nigerian Exchange Limited, NGX, has commenced moves to attract the Nigeria Blue Economy sector to the capital market through the issuance of Blue Bond . Speaking to Vanguard on the sidelines of the quarterly citizens and stakeholders’ engagement organized by the Ministry of Marine and Blue Economy in Lagos .

Title: Nigeria loses N2.5trn to maritime logistics inefficiencies—TT
Summary: Nigeria has lost over N2.5 trillion to inefficiencies in maritime transport logistics . The firm stated that investment in transport infrastructure and technology remains critical to unlocking the full trade potential of Nigeria’s ports, highways, and the wider regional markets .

Title: Femi Otedola increases stake in First HoldCo by N2.01 bn
Summary: Femi Otedola has increased his stake in First HoldCo Plc with the acquisition of additional 64,878,668 million shares valued at N2,011,238,708 . FBN Holdings disclosed the acquisition in two separate documents as required by the post listing requirement .

Title: Cooking gas price decline 21.42% to N16,195.07 — NBS
Summary: The national average retail price of refilling a 12.5kg cylinder of Liquefied Petroleum Gas, LPG, has dropped by 21.42 percent on a month-on-month, MoM basis, to N16,195.07 in August, 2025 from N20,609.48 in July . The National Bureau

Title: PenCom guides PFAs on securities lending, repurchase transactions
Summary: The National Pension Commission has introduced a framework to guide pension fund administrators (PFAs) on engagement in securities lending and repurchase transactions (repos) Securities lending is a transaction where securities are temporarily transferred from a lender to a borrower, typically in exchange for a fee or collateral, while Repos are the transactions .
